translation.Message_0_Page_0: We'll activate all four of the beacons once you are clear of the area.  Meanwhile, <color=uncommon>Nitro</color>, <color=uncommon>Needles</color>, and <color=uncommon>Siren</color> will rescue the trapped soldiers. If you alert the horde, the beacons will be disabled requiring you to retrieve new ones from <color=uncommon>Chitchat</color>.
